item.name: wooden_arrow
item.description: You see a wooden arrow. With a supply of arrowsin one hand and a bow in the other you can fight from a distance.

item.name: steel_arrow
item.description: You see a shining steel arrow. With plenty ofthese, and a good bow, you'll be a formidable archer.

item.name: dress
item.description: You see a dress, whichprovides practically no defence. It is barely worth picking up.

item.name: leather_armor
item.description: You see a worn suit of leather armor. It willprovide only minimal protection.

item.name: leather_cuirass
item.description: You see a leather cuirass, well made butstill able to be pierced by sharp swords.

item.name: leather_armor_+1
item.description: You see a suit of leather armor +1. The leatheris toughened somehow for better protection.

item.name: studded_armor
item.description: You see a suit of studded armor. Some studs areloose o r rusty but it is still fit for purpose.

item.name: chain_armor
item.description: You see a suit of chain armor. Perhaps even ifyou don't need it, you can sell it.

item.name: chain_armor_+1
item.description: You see a robust suit of chain armor +1. Thelinks are closely spaced so even the sharpest point should not pierce it.

item.name: scale_armor
item.description: You see a suit of scale armor. It is not flexiblelike chain, but will be a better defense.

item.name: scale_armor_+1
item.description: You see a suit of scale armor +1, whose roundedscales will protect you from many blows.

item.name: chain_armor_+3
item.description: You see a valuable suit of chain armor +3. It iscrafted from fine links of expensive metal.

item.name: scale_armor_+2
item.description: You see a formidable suit of scale armor +2.

item.name: plate_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. You imagine it would be heavy butthe steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong.

item.name: elvish_armor
item.description: You see a suit ofelvish armor. It's made from tree leaves but it is really of good quality.

item.name: barbarian_armor
item.description: You see a suit ofelvish armor. It's made from tree leaves but it is really of good quality.

item.name: golden_armor
item.description: You see a suit ofgolden armor. It's made from the best materials with great attention to detail.

item.name: shadow_armor
item.description: You see a suit ofshadow armor. It's hard to decide with what it is made, it is so dark.

item.name: dwarvish_armor
item.description: You see a suit ofshadow armor. It's hard to decide with what it is made, it is so dark.

item.name: stone_armor
item.description: You see a suit of ice armor. It's made from the hardest materials with great attention to detail.

item.name: ice_armor
item.description: You see a suit ofice armor. It's made from the hardest materials with great attention to detail.

item.name: chaos_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. You imagine it would be heavy but the steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong. It has been magically enhanced.

item.name: magic_plate_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. You imagine it would be heavy but the steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong. It has been magically enhanced.

item.name: black_armor
item.description: You see a suit of plate armor. You imagine it would be heavy but the steel is well tempered and the suit is very strong. It has been magically enhanced.

item.name: old_scythe
item.description: You see an old scythe, it used to be weapon of death. But now it is only a useful tool for farming.

item.name: small_axe
item.description: You see a smallaxe. It appears well made but yoususpect it is too light to do much damage.

item.name: hand_axe
item.description: You see a hand axe, well worn from years of usebut may prove useful.

item.name: axe
item.description: You see a rusty but heavy axe. What it lacks insharpness it makes up for in weight.

item.name: battle_axe
item.description: You see a battle axe. It is well crafted andsharp despite its age.

item.name: scythe
item.description: You see the weapon of death - a scythe. It looks dangerous but perhaps also a useful tool for farming.

item.name: twoside_axe
item.description: You see a well crafted twoside axe.

item.name: bardiche
item.description: You see a rare and powerfulbardiche.

item.name: halberd
item.description: You see a rare halberd, with an axe's blade fusedonto a shaft. It is both heavy and keen-edged.

item.name: black_scythe
item.description: You see the weapon of death - a scythe. It looks dangerous but perhaps also a useful tool for farming.

item.name: black_halberd
item.description: You see a rare halberd, with an axe's blade fused onto a shaft. It is both heavy and keen-edged.

item.name: leather_boots
item.description: You see a simple pair of leather boots to giveyour feet some protection.

item.name: studded_boots
item.description: You see a pair of worn studded boots withmoderate protection for your feet.

item.name: chain_boots
item.description: You see a pair of chain boots, quite rusty butstill strong.

item.name: steel_boots
item.description: You see a pair of steel boots, fit for any soldier.

item.name: elvish_boots
item.description: You see a pair of elvish boots.

item.name: golden_boots
item.description: You see a pair of golden boots. They will beheavy to wear but well worth their weight.

item.name: shadow_boots
item.description: You see a pair of shadow boots. You can't fathom what they are made of.

item.name: stone_boots
item.description: You see a pair of shadow boots. You can't fathom what they are made of.

item.name: chaos_boots
item.description: You see a pair of shadow boots. You can't fathom what they are made of.

item.name: green_thing_boots
item.description: You see a pair of green thing boots.

item.name: black_boots
item.description: You see a pair of shadow boots. You can't fathom what they are made of.

item.name: present
item.description: You see a christmas present. Open it.

item.name: basket
item.description: You see an easter basket. Look inside.

item.name: cloak
item.description: You see a simple cloth cloak.

item.name: elf_cloak
item.description: You see a white elf cloak. It doesn't look very warm.

item.name: dwarf_cloak
item.description: You see a dwarf cloak. Apparently this passes forfashion in some parts, but to you it looks more functional than fashionable.

item.name: elvish_cloak
item.description: You see an elvish cloak. The material is dark, butthick and warm.

item.name: elf_cloak_+2
item.description: You see a blue elf cloak +2. The material isthick and warm.

item.name: stone_cloak
item.description: You see a blue elf cloak +2. The material isthick and warm.

item.name: green_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a huge green dragon cloak. It's probablytoo big for you but, even dragging on the floor it will provide excellent protection.

item.name: bone_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a bone dragon cloak. It's incredibly old,like its last owner.

item.name: lich_cloak
item.description: You see a purple lich cloak. It's stained withblood - yours, from the previous undead owner, or perhaps the blood of his enemies...

item.name: vampire_cloak
item.description: You see a vibrant red vampire cloak. Wearing itsends a shiver down your spine.

item.name: shadow_cloak
item.description: You see a shadow cloak.

item.name: blue_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a blue dragon cloak. The weave is tightand strong, though you wish the colour drew less attention.

item.name: black_dragon_cloak
item.description: You see a torn section from an enormousblack dragon cloak. You're very lucky: the piece is just the right size for a human to wear.

item.name: club
item.description: You see a wooden club. It won't kill much but isbetter than no weapon.

item.name: mace
item.description: You see a mace,much neglected in years of use.

item.name: flail
item.description: You see a military flail. Swinging it in circleswill tire you but it will be an effective weapon.

item.name: mace_+2
item.description: You see a shining mace +2. Despite lookingornamental, it is sharp enough to do some damage.

item.name: skull_staff
item.description: You see a rare skull staff. It appears mysticalbut will work like any other staff.

item.name: hammer
item.description: You see a common hammer. It is heavy enough thatyou should be able to bludgeon your enemies with it.

item.name: hammer_+3
item.description: You see a valuable hammer +3. This golden weaponmay be worth a lot to someone.

item.name: war_hammer
item.description: You see a huge war hammer. It is a fearsome weapon.

item.name: ice_war_hammer
item.description: You see a huge ice war hammer. It is a fearsome weapon.

item.name: chaos_hammer
item.description: You see a huge war hammer. It is a fearsome weapon.

item.name: vulcano_hammer
item.description: The weapon of a God.

item.name: ugmash
item.description: You see a wooden club. It won't kill much but isbetter than no weapon.

item.name: club_of_thorns
item.description: You see the club of thorns, The thorns are full with blood of tortured humans. It is hugely powerful but will drain your life to use it.

item.name: antidote
item.description: You see an antidote, to cure you of poison andprotect you for a while.

item.name: greater_antidote
item.description: You see a greater_antidote, to cure you of poison andprot ect you for a long while.

item.name: ham
item.description: You see a juicy ham.

item.name: sandwich
item.description: You see a ham and cheese sandwich.

item.name: pie
item.description: You see a meat and vegetable pie.

item.name: easter_egg
item.description: You see a lovely chocolate easter egg.

item.name: leather_helmet
item.description: You see a leather helmet, it seems more like a hatthan a defensive item.

item.name: studded_helmet
item.description: You see a studded helmet, it should protect yourhead against cuts but perhaps not hard blows.

item.name: chain_helmet
item.description: You see a solid chain helmet, it will be excellentprotection for your head.

item.name: golden_helmet
item.description: You see a heavy golden helmet. The thick metalshould protect you against almost anything.

item.name: shadow_helmet
item.description: You see a heavy shadow helmet. Instead ofshining, it darkly gleams.

item.name: dungeon_silver_key
item.description: You see a fancy silver key.

item.name: lich_gold_key
item.description: You see a fancy golden key.

item.name: minotaur_key
item.description: You see a fancy bronze key.

item.name: nalwor_bank_key
item.description: You see a key to the customer room of Nalwor Bank.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_001
item.description: You see a key to room #001 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_002
item.description: You see a key to room #002 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_003
item.description: You see a key to room #003 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_004
item.description: You see a key to room #004 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_005
item.description: You see a key to room #005 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_006
item.description: You see a key to room #006 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_007
item.description: You see a key to room #007 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: fado_hotel_key_008
item.description: You see a key to room #008 in the Fado Hotel.

item.name: small_key
item.description: You see the key for Zara's row house in Ados.

item.name: leather_legs
item.description: You see a pair of leather legs. They look new butthey're poor quality.

item.name: studded_legs
item.description: You see a pair of blood stained studded legs.You're not sure if the blood came from their last owner ... or his enemies.

item.name: chain_legs
item.description: You see a pair of well made chain legs. Theyshould protect you against any attacks aimed low.

item.name: elvish_legs
item.description: You see a pair of elvish legs.

item.name: golden_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shining, strong golden legs.

item.name: shadow_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shadow legs. The weight of themis incredible.

item.name: chaos_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shadow legs. The weight of them is incredible.

item.name: black_legs
item.description: You see a pair of shadow legs. The weight of them is incredible.

item.name: dart
item.description: You see a dart.

item.name: power_dart
item.description: You see a power dart.

item.name: shuriken
item.description: You see a shuriken.

item.name: wooden_spear
item.description: You see a wooden spear. With that primitive but powerful weaponyou can fight from a distance.

item.name: wooden_bow
item.description: You see a wooden bow. With this in one hand, andwooden arrows in the other, you may be able to attack from a distance.

item.name: longbow
item.description: You see a longbow. Equipped with this, and asupply of arrows, you will have an effective ranged attack.

item.name: longbow_+1
item.description: You see a longbow +1. It's better strung thanmost bows, for excellent ranged attack.

item.name: wood
item.description: You see some wood, fallen from a nearby tree.

item.name: grain
item.description: You see a sheaf of grain.

item.name: wool
item.description: You see wool. It was recently shorn.

item.name: yarn
item.description: You see a ball of yarn. It was spun with care.

item.name: cloth
item.description: You see a roll of cloth. It is of first-class quality.

item.name: emerald_ring
item.description: You see ring of life. Wear it, and you risk less from death.

item.name: home_scroll
item.description: You see a home scroll, it will take you back to semos city.

item.name: nalwor_city_scroll
item.description: You see a nalwor city scroll, it will take you back to nalwor city.

item.name: ados_city_scroll
item.description: You see a ados city scroll, it will take you back to ados city.

item.name: fado_city_scroll
item.description: You see a fado city scroll, it will take you back to fado city.

item.name: buckler
item.description: You see a small buckler. It may protect youagainst swords and maces but against stronger weapons you do not trust it.

item.name: wooden_shield
item.description: You see a wooden shield. It is made of cheap wood and heavily used.However, it still seems to offer you some kind of basic protection.

item.name: studded_shield
item.description: You see a studded shield. It's a little dentedbut seems robust enough.

item.name: plate_shield
item.description: You see a solid plate shield. It is in goodcondition, and might beworth a little.

item.name: lion_shield
item.description: You see a valuable lion shield. It isheavy enough to defend you against strong attacks.

item.name: unicorn_shield
item.description: You see a unicorn shield. It's beautifullycrafted and will give you excellent protection.

item.name: lion_shield_+1
item.description: A lion shield +1 glints at you. It will defendyou well.

item.name: skull_shield
item.description: The face of a skull scowls at you from this fearsome skullshield.

item.name: crown_shield
item.description: You see a mighty crown shield. It is in perfect condition.

item.name: elvish_shield
item.description: You see an elvish shield made of tree leaves.

item.name: green_dragon_shield
item.description: You see an green dragon shield, scaly and strong.

item.name: golden_shield
item.description: You see a golden shield, it could be the ultimatein defence.

item.name: shadow_shield
item.description: You see a shadow shield. Rather than reflectinglight, it seems to absorb it.

item.name: chaos_shield
item.description: You see a shadow shield. Rather than reflecting light, it seems to absorb it.

item.name: black_shield
item.description: You see a shadow shield. Rather than reflecting light, it seems to absorb it.

item.name: knife
item.description: You see a blunt knife which looks capable of little damage.

item.name: dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you may be able to hurt something with it.

item.name: short_sword
item.description: You see a well kept short sword which will be easy to carry as you travel.

item.name: r_hand_sword
item.description: You see r hand sword. It must be used with l hand sword.

item.name: l_hand_sword
item.description: You see l hand sword. It must be used with r hand sword.

item.name: sword
item.description: You see a sharp sword which might even be worth a little.

item.name: scimitar
item.description: This scimitar catches the light as you look at it, it will be a powerful weapon.

item.name: katana
item.description: You see a valuable katana, with a lethal looking blade.

item.name: claymore
item.description: This claymore is very hard to lift as it is so heavy. It will be a good weapon if you can swing it.

item.name: demon_sword
item.description: Demon skeletons return from hell with this sword.

item.name: vampire_sword
item.description: You see the vampire sword, which will suck life from those you attack with it.

item.name: assassin_dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you may be able to hurt something with it.

item.name: biting_sword
item.description: The point of this biting sword is chiselled to alethal point. It will serve you well.

item.name: fire_sword
item.description: Flames race along this fire sword as you wield it.

item.name: chaos_sword
item.description: It hurts.

item.name: broadsword
item.description: You see a mighty broadsword. Enemies will see their death.

item.name: ice_sword
item.description: You see an ice sword, the blade is lethally cold to the touch, and you know it is one of the best weapons you'll find.

item.name: great_sword
item.description: This rare great sword is heavy and of good craftmanship.

item.name: dark_dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you may be able to hurt something with it.

item.name: soul_dagger
item.description: You see a dagger, it is little more than decorative but you may be able to hurt something with it.

item.name: drow_sword
item.description: This is a genuine drow sword.

item.name: orcish_sword
item.description: It is badly done and weights a lot.

item.name: elvish_sword
item.description: This an elvish sword. It looks like it is made from tree leaves!

item.name: immortal_sword
item.description: This immortal sword is a gift of gods to the chosen one. It is heavy and of exquisite craftmanship.

item.name: demon_fire_sword
item.description: An horrible sword taken from hell deepest dungeon

item.name: gold_pan
item.description: You see a gold pan. It is the traditional tool to prospect for gold.

item.name: fishing_rod
item.description: You see a fishing rod. If you find a fishing spot you can catch fish with it.
